Description.Text:
Boasting a prime seafront location overlooking a beach of more than 600 m of fine white sand in the Jardines del Rey district,and facing one of the Caribbean Sea's largest coral reefs, this superb hotel offers guests 352 stunning rooms. Its unique characteristics make this the perfect choice for an idyllic family holiday. The spectacular pool area including an aqua bar set among lush native flora, the wide range of culinary delights - including show cooking-, the lively sports and entertainment programme featuring live shows and music, and the exclusive Miniclub, all combine to guarantee an unforgettable holiday experience. ' 'All Inclusive Description - ' 'CLASSIC' 'ALL INCLUSIVE CONCEPT

24 hour All Inclusive service with multiple options (includes national and international beverages). The hotel offers a range of additional services.

LOS PORTALES -Buffet Restaurant Breakfast: 07:00 - 10:00 Lunch: 13:00 - 15:00 Dinner: 18:30 - 22:00 LA SIRENA - Pool snack and fast food Lunch: 12:00 - 16:00 Snacks: 16:00 - 18:00 Late snacks: 23:00 - 06:00 EL COLIBRI AND GRAND CAFE - Lobby Bar: 09:00 - 01:00 EL CANEY - Cigar Lounge: 18:00 - 23:00 BEACH BAR: 10:00 - 17:00 EL RIO AZUL - Pool bar: 10:00 - 17:00 LA SIRENA - Snack Bar: 24 hours LA TORMENTA - Disco: 23:00 - 02:00

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
